A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After viewing this movie for the second time I've come to the conclusion this is a good \"movie\" but it is NOT a good \"Star Wars Movie\". Too much humor\, wasted 30 minutes on Finn/Rose story line and wasted Luke Skywalker. Both times i saw this movie it left a bad taste in my mouth. General audience will like this movie\, but Star Wars fans will hate it.
